stages.name: The hero realizes their initial character motivation!
The hero sets out to fulfill their goals
The heroe faces increasing hardships and tragedies
After the point of no return, the hero must figure out how to build again towards their final goal.
The hero defeats all their enemies in hierarchical order

moments.name: opening image
moments.description: First impression of our hero.

moments.name: inciting incident
moments.description: Life-changing event or catalyst for change occurs!

moments.name: establishing quest objective
moments.description: The hero sets their sights on their objective!

moments.name: first big threshold
moments.description: False victory or defeat - first major turning point!

moments.name: major defeat
moments.description: Major defeat! Where do we go from here?

moments.name: point of no return
moments.description: Point of no return! Followed by a timeskip or complete narrative pivot.

moments.name: what's next
moments.description: So what's next?

moments.name: cataclysmic event
moments.description: A cataclysmic event occurs, hurtling us towards the finale.

moments.name: emotional final scene
moments.description: Every story needs a heart-wrenching scene before its final battle.

moments.name: closing image
moments.description: Our last glimpse of the hero!

stages.name: Old ally Hardin has become evil!
Marth sets out to save Archanea
Hardin's forces close in on Marth
Marth travels to collect the shards of the Starsphere

moments.name: opening image
moments.description: Two years later, Marth is married to Caeda and Nyna is married to Hardin.

moments.name: inciting incident
moments.description: Lorenz tells Marth that his former ally, Hardin, has become evil!

moments.name: establishing quest objective
moments.description: Marth sets out to reclaim Altea!

moments.name: first big threshold
moments.description: Marth learns about the Starsphere and how to save the world!

moments.name: major defeat
moments.description: Hardin forces Marth to flee to Khadein.

moments.name: point of no return
moments.description: Marth learns that Hardin has been corrupted by the Darksphere and how to save him!

moments.name: what's next
moments.description: Marth begins to follow Anri's path to retrieve the Lightsphere.

moments.name: cataclysmic event
moments.description: Marth learns the story behind Hardin's corruption from his dying ally, Boah.

moments.name: emotional final scene
moments.description: Hardin is defeat and asks for Marth's forgiveness as he dies.

moments.name: closing image
moments.description: The continent experiences a new era of peace!

moments.name: opening image
moments.description: Sigurd is appointed a holy knight of Grannvale

moments.name: inciting incident
moments.description: Sigurd meets and immediately falls in love with Deirdre.

moments.name: establishing quest objective
moments.description: Sigurd sets out to save Eldigan, his childhood friend.

moments.name: first big threshold
moments.description: Sigurd is forced to kill Eldigan after failing to convince him to back down.

moments.name: major defeat
moments.description: Sigurd is betrayed by Arvis, who has mind-wiped his wife Deirdre.

moments.name: point of no return
moments.description: Sigurd's army is annihilated and Sigurd is personally murdered by Arvis.

moments.name: what's next
moments.description: Seventeen years later, Sigurd's son Seliph begins to amass an army of the children of his father's lost comrades.

moments.name: cataclysmic event
moments.description: Seliph seizes the castle in Thracia, ending the regional conflict.

moments.name: emotional final scene
moments.description: Seliph sees a vision of his parents in the afterlife.

moments.name: closing image
moments.description: Seliph has successfully avenged his parents, but he still feels empty. He still has a ways to go.

stages.name: Following Hector's death, Roy journeys to Ostia
Roy forms and travels with the Lycian Army

moments.name: opening image
moments.description: Roy returns home after hearing his father is ill.

moments.name: inciting incident
moments.description: Roy meets Guinivere, the princess of the nation waging war against his.

moments.name: establishing quest objective
moments.description: Roy sets out to Araphen to meet with Hector

moments.name: first big threshold
moments.description: Roy is too late to save Hector, and is sent to Ostia.

moments.name: major defeat
moments.description: Roy learns that his childhood friend, Lilina, has been taken hostage!

moments.name: point of no return
moments.description: Narcian is defeated and Lycia is saved!

moments.name: what's next
moments.description: Six months later, Roy sets out with the Lycian army.

moments.name: cataclysmic event
moments.description: Roy obtains the Binding Blade!

moments.name: emotional final scene
moments.description: Zephiel speaks with Brunnya before the final battle and asks her to flee.

moments.name: closing image
moments.description: Roy and Guinivere look towards a new future for Bern.

moments.name: opening image
moments.description: Micaiah and Sothe lead the Dawn Brigade, a rebel group opposing Begnion oppression of war-torn Daein.

moments.name: inciting incident
moments.description: Micaiah discovers the existence of the long-lost prince of Daein.

moments.name: establishing quest objective
moments.description: Micaiah joins forces with Prince Pelleas to liberate Daein.

moments.name: first big threshold
moments.description: Micaiah and Pelleas liberate Daein from Begnion rule!

moments.name: major defeat
moments.description: Queen Elincia's closest friend, Lucia, is taken hostage by the insurrectionists.

moments.name: point of no return
moments.description: Elincia launches a successful gambit against her opponents and Lucia is saved by the Greil Mercenaries.

moments.name: what's next
moments.description: Ike is hired by the Laguz Alliance to declare war against Begnion.

moments.name: cataclysmic event
moments.description: The fighting across the continent awakens the goddess Ashera, who turns all humans to stone.

moments.name: emotional final scene
moments.description: Ike regains his lost memories of his childhood, including the death of his mother and meeting Soren.

moments.name: closing image
moments.description: Once he saw stability returned, Ike left on a journey to lands still unknown. He was never seen again.

stages.name: Robin meets Chrom and the Shepherds
Gangrel, the king of the neighboring nation, declares war on Ylisse.
Retrieving the Gemstones for the Fire Emblem

moments.name: opening image
moments.description: Robin awakes in a field with no memories, meeting Chrom and Lissa.

moments.name: inciting incident
moments.description: Chrom meets a masked champion named Marth who wields the same sword as he does.

moments.name: establishing quest objective
moments.description: Gangrel declares war on Ylisse!

moments.name: first big threshold
moments.description: The Shepherds are ambushed and Emmeryn is captured!

moments.name: major defeat
moments.description: Emmeryn sacrifices herself to save her country.

moments.name: point of no return
moments.description: Chrom defeats Gangrel and becomes king of Ylisse.

moments.name: establishing quest objective
moments.description: Two years after Gangrel's defeat, Chrom discovers that his masked friend is none other than his daughter Lucina, who has traveled back from a ruined future.

moments.name: cataclysmic event
moments.description: Robin is mind-controlled by Grima. Lucina realizes that Robin killed her father and attempts to kill them.

moments.name: emotional final scene
moments.description: Robin defies destiny to save Chrom!

moments.name: closing image
moments.description: Robin awakes in a field, meeting Chrom and Lissa.

stages.name: Discovering those who oppose the church
Byleth awakens to their true power

moments.name: opening image
moments.description: Byleth saves three people who turn out to be the future rules of the three nations of Fodlan.

moments.name: inciting incident
moments.description: Byleth becomes a professor at Garreg Mach and chooses to guide Dimitri and the Blue Lions.

moments.name: establishing quest objective
moments.description: Flayn is kidnapped by the Death Knight, who was disguised as a professor. Byleth manages to save Flayn, but encounters the Flame Emperor for the first time.

moments.name: first big threshold
moments.description: Byleth's father, Jeralt, is killed by an agent of 'Those Who Slither In The Dark'.

moments.name: major defeat
moments.description: Edelgard reveals herself to be the Flame Emperor and is worked with TWSITD. She declares war on the church.

moments.name: point of no return
moments.description: Byleth is knocked unconscious into a chasm and reawakens five years later to discover the continent engulfed in war.

moments.name: establishing quest objective
moments.description: Byleth reunites with Dimitri, who has become bitter, unstable, and haunted by the ghosts of his deceased family. He vows to kill Edelgard at any cost.

moments.name: cataclysmic event
moments.description: Dimitri's father figure, Rodrigue, is killed at the end of a battle. Dimitri breaks down and abandons his thirst for revenge.

moments.name: emotional final scene
moments.description: Dimitri and Edelgard meet in a neutral place, reminiscing on their childhood friendship. They are unable to come to an agreement.

moments.name: closing image
moments.description: Dimitri reunites Fodlan as its ruler and Byleth becomes the archbishop of the Church.
